subject: Baseball
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Collins, at 66 the oldest manager in the major leagues, led the Mets to their first pennant in 15 years after his job appeared in jeopardy earlier in the season.
snippet: Collins, at 66 the oldest manager in the major leagues, led the Mets to their first pennant in 15 years after his job appeared in jeopardy earlier in the season.
